data.description:
FIGHT with any weapon you can find against different enemies in the Hex7 Arenas. 
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031640_1611492052972544_8434024045580790583_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=_CqmKdf7-8UQ7kNvgG_Vv1i&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDPE562gEVk6AvP3I87TDsj4aan2xf0PhTYrNhvc44QcQ&oe=66DAFB8C)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game as much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035393_1502492917145105_2500292279720560247_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=wGYwEF8MoKMQ7kNvgFCnY-s&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDHzEXd3kN0VFBRVXxtTMS3Ri6iG_Yt9Zy0QamzZzH7yQ&oe=66DAF99F)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75392879_331169873202633_892518978300243902_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=oVMpVlJSq_AQ7kNvgFV0pBz&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBr0sM2wP13q4LO_lFKvUea4i_EpqWdDNkTt2-gUMaGYQ&oe=66DADEF1)
